info.name: Darkish Tutanota
info.description:
Version 1.00
This is a dark theme for Tutanota, it's well done, i dare say.
Thanks to RankWinner, i made the theme with his Tutanota Dark. Thanks to hexen for the logo from his style.
info.additionalInfo:
If you know how to remove a bug, please tell me.
Solved bug in v. 1.00: links' color is black instead of white (now is magenta). Known bugs: two drop menus are white instead of gray (the "Language of notification email" on new encrypted mail; the "Sender" on new mail).
